question: Ekamabaranadhar temple of Kanchipuram in Tamil Nadu was built by__?
explanation: Kanchipuram is known as the "city of a thousand temples. The 192 feet high temple tower of Ekamabaranadhar temple and the 100-pillar mandabam (building) in Varadaraja Perumal temple in this town are famous, and are considered marvels of the architectural techniques of the Vijayanagara dynasty.
